title: Fairness in AI-Driven Oncology: Investigating Racial and Gender Biases in Large Language Models
abstract: Introduction: Large language model (LLM) chatbots have many applications in medical settings. However, these tools can potentially perpetuate racial and gender biases through their responses, worsening disparities in healthcare. With the …
